Description:
In the southern temple you see an ancient altar that still seems to have some energy, and soft tones emanate from it as you approach. Looking around, you can see a few sirens in the water watching you carefully.

You feel an indistinct whisper in the back of your mind that seems to respond to the song of the altar, and you recall that you were supposed to empower the Whispering Stone using an altar like this.
DescriptionAction: The Whispering Stone murmurs and you feel the urge to place it upon the altar.
